original_text: And he shall make an atonement for the holy sanctuary, and he shall make an atonement for the tabernacle of the congregation, and for the altar, and he shall make an atonement for the priests, and for all the people of the congregation.
korean_text: 지성소를 속죄하며 회막과 제단을 속죄하고 또 제사장들과 백성의 회중을 위하여 속죄할지니

sentences.original_text: And he shall make an atonement for the holy sanctuary
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성소를 위한 속죄를 해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and he shall make an atonement for the tabernacle of the congregation
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 회막을 위한 속죄를 해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and he shall make an atonement for the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 제사장들을 위한 속죄를 해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and for all the people of the congregation
